title: Research Elektron Machinedrum UW and Octatrack sample machines
description: Analyze the technical specifications, parameter ranges, and behavior of Elektron Machinedrum UW record/playback machines and Octatrack sample machines. Document key features like sample start/stop points, pitch control, time-stretching, filters, effects chains, LFO modulation, and parameter ranges for accurate emulation.
acceptance_criteria: Complete technical documentation of all machine parameters, parameter ranges, and behavioral characteristics. Include audio processing chain diagrams and parameter mapping tables.

title: Implement time-stretching and pitch shifting
description: Implement high-quality time-stretching and pitch-shifting algorithms supporting formant preservation, various quality modes (real-time vs offline), and the characteristic Elektron 'tribal' time-stretch sound. Optimize for real-time performance.
acceptance_criteria: Time-stretching works across reasonable ranges without significant artifacts. Pitch shifting maintains audio quality. Formant preservation option functions correctly. Processing latency is acceptable for real-time use.

title: Implement preset management system
description: Implement comprehensive preset management system including factory presets, user preset banks, import/export functionality, preset tagging and search, and randomization features. Ensure backward compatibility and efficient storage.
acceptance_criteria: Factory presets showcase plugin capabilities. User can create, save, and load presets reliably. Import/export works across platforms. Search and organization features are efficient. Preset loading is instantaneous.

title: Implement basic VST/CLAP plugin framework
description: Implement the basic plugin framework using nih-plugin, including plugin parameters, GUI setup, DAW integration, MIDI note handling, parameter automation, and basic state management. Create minimal working plugin that can be loaded in DAWs.
acceptance_criteria: Plugin successfully loads in major DAWs (Ableton Live, Logic Pro, Reaper). Basic parameter controls visible and functional. MIDI note triggering works. Plugin passes basic validation tests.

title: Implement effects chains and processors
description: Implement effects chains including delay (ping-pong, tempo-sync), reverb (various algorithms), distortion (multiple types), compressor, EQ (3-band parametric), and lo-fi/bitcrushing effects. Allow flexible routing and parameter modulation.
acceptance_criteria: All effects process audio correctly without artifacts. Effects routing is flexible and intuitive. Tempo-sync works properly with DAW. CPU usage stays within acceptable limits for multiple instances.

title: Design and implement GUI interface
description: Design and implement intuitive GUI interface matching Elektron aesthetic. Include machine parameter displays, waveform visualization, modulation matrix, preset browser, and real-time parameter feedback. Use egui or similar framework for cross-platform compatibility.
acceptance_criteria: GUI is responsive and intuitive. All parameters are accessible from interface. Visual feedback is accurate and helpful. Interface scales properly on different screen sizes. Performance is acceptable for smooth interaction.

title: Design audio processing architecture
description: Design the core audio processing architecture including sample loading/management, playback engine with time-stretching, pitch shifting, multi-mode filters, effects chains, parameter modulation system, and real-time parameter smoothing. Define data structures for samples, machines, and effect parameters.
acceptance_criteria: Complete architectural design document with detailed component diagrams, data structure definitions, and processing chain specifications. Approved design review meeting completion.

title: Implement multi-mode filter system
description: Implement multi-mode filter system including low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, notch, and resonant filters. Add filter drive, filter envelope with key follow, filter modulation routing, and characteristic Elektron filter sound emulation.
acceptance_criteria: All filter modes function correctly. Resonance and drive parameters work as expected. Filter envelope is smooth and predictable. Filter sound closely matches Elektron character. CPU usage remains reasonable.

title: Successfully installed Beads memory tool
description: Install and configure Beads for persistent AI memory across coding sessions

title: Implement sample loading and management system
description: Create sample loading system supporting WAV/AIFF formats, sample pool management, memory optimization, streaming for large files, sample metadata storage, and efficient sample access patterns. Implement sample bank switching and preset management.
acceptance_criteria: Successfully loads and plays various audio formats. Handles large sample files without memory issues. Sample switching is seamless without audio glitches. Memory usage stays within reasonable limits.

title: Implement LFO and modulation system
description: Implement comprehensive LFO system with multiple waveforms, rate and depth controls, fade-in/out, tempo sync, and assignable modulation targets. Include parameter mapping system for modulating any plugin parameter.
acceptance_criteria: LFO waveforms are accurate and smooth. Rate control covers full range from slow to audio rate. Modulation assignments work for all target parameters. Parameter changes are smooth without zipper noise.

title: Implement core sample playback engine
description: Implement the core sample playback engine with sample start/stop points, playback direction, loop modes, pitch control without time-stretch, basic envelope control, and parameter smoothing. Ensure sample-accurate timing and glitch-free playback.
acceptance_criteria: Sample playback is sample-accurate and glitch-free. Start/stop points work correctly. Pitch control functions properly. Basic envelope shapes implemented. Parameter changes are smooth without artifacts.

title: Performance optimization and testing
description: Optimize plugin performance including SIMD optimizations, memory management, multi-threading for heavy processing, and CPU profiling. Implement comprehensive testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, and automated DAW compatibility testing.
acceptance_criteria: Plugin meets CPU usage targets (<5% single instance on modern CPU). Memory usage is optimized and stable. All tests pass. Plugin runs stably in major DAWs for extended periods. No memory leaks detected.

title: Implement MIDI note handling and mapping
description: Implement comprehensive MIDI note triggering system including velocity sensitivity, note retrigger modes, MIDI learn for parameters, CC mapping, and MPE support. Ensure sample-accurate MIDI timing and low-latency response.
acceptance_criteria: MIDI notes trigger samples with accurate timing. Velocity affects volume/envelope. CC parameters map correctly. MPE support for advanced controllers. MIDI timing is sample-accurate.

title: Quality assurance and beta testing
description: Conduct comprehensive QA testing including DAW compatibility testing, stress testing, audio quality analysis, performance benchmarking, and user beta testing. Create automated test suite and address all reported issues.
acceptance_criteria: Plugin passes all automated tests. Compatible with all major DAWs. No audio artifacts or stability issues. Performance meets targets. Beta tester feedback incorporated.

title: Documentation and release preparation
description: Create comprehensive documentation including user manual, developer documentation, installation guides, and API documentation. Prepare release builds for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Create demo content and promotional materials.
acceptance_criteria: User manual covers all features completely. Installation process is straightforward for all platforms. Release builds are tested and stable. Demo content showcases plugin capabilities effectively.

title: Setup project structure and dependencies
description: Initialize Rust project with nih-plugin framework, configure Cargo.toml for VST/CLAP plugin development, and establish basic project structure including src/lib.rs, src/plugin.rs, and supporting modules.

title: Implement ultrawave VST/CLAP plugin - Elektron Machinedrum UW emulation
description:
Create a high-quality, professional Rust-based VST/CLAP plugin using nih-plugin that accurately emulates the Elektron Machinedrum UW record/playback machines. This plugin will replicate the realtime sample playback functionality similar to Elektron's Octatrack machines, providing advanced audio manipulation features for digital audio workstations.

## Objectives
- Deliver a production-ready audio plugin that captures the essence of Elektron's legendary sample playback machines
- Provide musicians and producers with powerful, creative sampling tools
- Ensure low-latency, high-performance operation in professional DAW environments
- Maintain compatibility across Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms

## Scope
### In Scope
- Full emulation of UW machine parameters and behavior
- High-quality time-stretching with multiple algorithms
- Comprehensive filter system with drive and modulation
- Effects chains (delay, reverb, distortion, etc.)
- LFO and parameter modulation system
- Intuitive GUI with Elektron-inspired aesthetic
- Preset management with factory and user presets
- VST3 and CLAP format support
- MIDI note triggering and parameter automation

### Out of Scope
- Hardware integration or physical modeling
- Multi-machine chaining (focus on single machine emulation)
- Live recording (external recording workflow assumed)
- Third-party plugin hosting
- Real-time collaboration features

## Deliverables
- Cross-platform VST3/CLAP plugin binaries
- Factory preset bank showcasing capabilities
- User manual and documentation
- Demo project files
- Source code repository

## Success Criteria
- Plugin passes all major DAW compatibility tests
- Audio quality matches or exceeds Elektron hardware standards
- CPU usage remains under 5% for single instance on modern hardware
- Zero crashes or stability issues in extended testing
- Positive user feedback from beta testers
- Commercial viability for plugin marketplace distribution

title: Implement audio routing and mixing system
description: Implement flexible audio routing system including stereo/mono modes, pan control, level controls, solo/mute functionality, and master output processing. Ensure proper gain staging and headroom management throughout the signal chain.
acceptance_criteria: Audio routing is flexible and intuitive. Pan and level controls work correctly. Signal chain maintains proper gain staging. Stereo processing is accurate and artifact-free.
